last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 27
last_episode_to_air.overview: Madawi grows anxious waiting for her mother’s return. A suspicious phone call prompts Ghanima to sneak outside in the dark. Elsewhere, Ilya sends Lameea a letter.

name: London Class
overview: Set in 1980s London, a group of Arab students attempts to navigate life amid love, jealousy, and conspiracy in the city of fog.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A group of people from every walk of life moves to London, each with a goal in mind they seek to fulfill.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Things get out of hand when Ilya tries to close a deal. After learning about her father's misfortune, Madawi bumps into Talal. Ghanem receives a distressing call.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Dary tries to put the blame on Mekdad for Sultan’s recklessness. Khadija starts feeling unwell. Ilya hatches a plan to free Wedad from Habeeb’s grip.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Maysoon is accused of stealing after she finds a ring that belongs to one of the girls. Ishtar refuses to listen to Mekdad’s excuses. Tension rises between Shbeeb and Asala.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Shahnaz collapses when she hears the news about Berlant. Sultan ensnares Ishtar with his wealthy appearance. Lameea’s life is threatened after Ilya regains consciousness.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Shbeeb, Asala and the others get reprimanded by the president of the university. Shahnaz blames Haider for her daughter’s accident. Dary tries to get close to Zeinab.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Nassir makes a pass at Madawi. Ishtar lashes out at a fashion store employee. Shbeeb finds himself in an awkward position in front of Asala. Miqdad offers Maysoon a new job.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Miqdad is heartbroken when he realises what Ishtar has done. Ghanima gets into an altercation with Madawi at the dinner table. Lameea forces Ilya to submit to her demands.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Maysoon ignores Ishtar’s attempts to apologise to her. Shbeeb acts erratically when Asala insists on leaving. Elsewhere, sparks fly between Ilya and Lameea.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Shamlan asks for Madawi’s hand in marriage. Shbeeb and Asala take a trip down memory lane. Shahnaz receives a call from the hospital about Berlant.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Madawi is concerned about the way her mum perceives Shamlan. Ilya and Lameea take their relationship to the next level. Dary’s friends begin losing patience with him.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ghanima puts all her efforts into winning Nasser’s heart. A sudden shift in Shamlan’s behaviour leaves Madawi confused. Elsewhere, Ishtar picks a fight with Sultan.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Talal tries to deny the allegations made against him as Qumasha executes her plan to tarnish Madawi’s image. Berlant starts warming up to Haider.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Khadeeja’s stomachache worsens. An intense argument takes Asala and Shbeeb back to square one. Madawi’s long absence starts drawing everyone’s attention.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: After being severely reprimanded by Asala, Madawi is determined to confront Talal straight away. Elsewhere, Miqdad stands up to Sultan in defense of Ishtar.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Mahmoud decides to teach Dary a lesson he’ll never forget. Maysoon bursts into tears when she realises who her daughter is. Elsewhere, Haider receives a mysterious guest.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Shbeeb receives devastating news from home. Khadeeja finds herself forced to make a life-altering decision. Madawi gets fed up with her mother’s apathy towards her.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Ghanima tries to convince Khadeeja to have an abortion, and later confronts Nasser with the truth. Ilya asks Maysoon for Lameea’s hand in marriage.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Ilya and Lameea celebrate their wedding in the rain. Haider demands an explanation after finding a pistol in Habeeb's belongings.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Ishtar rushes towards Maysoon’s screams for help as Haider asks Berlant for a dangerous favour. Ilya and Lameea face trouble in paradise.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: A fight breaks out between Jabr and Shahnaz over what the latter did to Maysoon. An awkward situation gains Ghanima a new friend.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Habib asks Ghanima to meet him in secret. Berlant confronts her mother over the kidnapping, as Maysoon's health takes a hit.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: The family anxiously waits for news on Maysoon’s condition. Shbeeb and Asala’s friends try to help them get along with each other. Khadija reveals a secret to Ghanem.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Shbeeb is livid when he sees Asala’s outfit. Jaber confronts Madawi's mum about her daughter's background. Elsewhere, Miqdad sacrifices his freedom for Ishtar.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Madawi pours her heart out to Maysoon. Lameea is left terrified by Ilya’s intimidating behaviour. Mahmoud and Zeinab head to Dary’s in distress looking for their son.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Lameea faces the consequences of Ilya's actions. Haider makes a drastic decision to avoid ending up behind bars. Meanwhile, Maysoon’s past comes knocking.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Madawi grows anxious waiting for her mother’s return. A suspicious phone call prompts Ghanima to sneak outside in the dark. Elsewhere, Ilya sends Lameea a letter.
